title: Offer Detail
description: Offer detail is used to capture the attributes of an offer in a proposition or response. Offers are the decision options in the offer management domain and the offer detail datatype extends the option detail datatype.

xdm:tags.title: Tags
xdm:tags.description: The set of tags associated with this offer. The tags are used in offer filter expressions to constrain the overall offer inventory to a topical sub set (category).

items.description: An identifier of a tag object. The value is the @id of the tag that is referenced. See tag schema: https://ns.adobe.com/experience/offer-management/tag
